Title: We will definitely free Taiwan!
Designer: Red Eagle Corps of the Air force, Nanjing (南京部队空军红鹰)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: An export version of this poster, with subtitles in English, French and German, was very popular in the West. It decorated many students' rooms, together with the portrait of Che Guevara.
